alert.note: Alert for Maui Windward West; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 30 at 3:27PM HST until January 31 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF LANAI AND THE BIG ISLAND UNTIL 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI THROUGH 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... .A NW swell will produce advisory level surf through Wednesday. This swell will gradually diminish Wednesday and Wednesday night. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Surf building to 14 to 18 feet. * WHERE...North facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Heed all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
